scripts.dev: cd react && npm install && BROWSER=none npm run start & cd electron && npm install && ./node_modules/.bin/electron .
scripts.build: npm install && rm -rf .tmp && cd ./electron && npm install --only=production && cd .. && cp -r ./electron ./.tmp && cd ./react && npm install --only=production && npm run build && cd .. && cp -r react/build .tmp && cd .tmp && mv -f index.prod.js index.js && ../node_modules/.bin/electron-builder && cd .. && rm -rf .tmp
